text:
Senior Congress leader Amarinder Singh on Monday strongly favoured extending the benefits of reservation to economically weaker sections among the general category, besides those already getting it.

Reacting to frequent agitations that usually turn violent like the current one in Haryana, Punjab Congress Chief Amarinder said, “the time has come that the economically weak and underprivileged from the general categories irrespective of the caste or community they belong to are also provided the reservation benefits.” - PTI
title: Amarinder favours reservation for the poor
